remarks: A constant polynomial matrix is a polynomial matrix.  (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2019.)
statement:
cpmat.s $e |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) $.
cpmat.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
cpmat.c $e |- C = ( N Mat P ) $.
cpmat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
cpmatpmat $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V /\ M e. S ) -> M e. B ) $.
